title: Error in Deleting XDBC server from Admin GUI
description:
If we delete a XDBC server from Admin GUI, it generates following error:
You've encountered an error in the server. Please copy the text below, and email support (support@marklogic.com):

500: Internal Server Error
XDMP-ARGTYPE: (err:XPTY0004) fn:get-local-name-from-QName((fn:expanded-QName("http://marklogic.com/xdmp/group", "namespace"), fn:expanded-QName("http://marklogic.com/xdmp/group", "using-namespace"))) -- arg1 is not of type xs:QName?
In /drop-xdbc-server-go.xqy on line 43

 ...</xs:schema>, xs:NCName("namespaces"), <namespaces xmlns="http://marklogic.com/xdmp/group" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/>, "/gr:groups/gr:group/gr:http-servers/gr:http-server[1]", "/gr:groups/gr:group/gr:xdbc-servers/gr:xdbc-server[2]")

Steps to recreate the Bug:
 
1. Click anyXDBC server from the appserver list.
2. In the XDBC server configuration page, click the the delete button.
3. In the next confirmation button, click yes.
 
Expected outcome:
 
The server will restart to reconfigure the modified appserver list

changeHistory.comment: bug:20103 This modification make it sure that the script will check all different type of appserver at the point of reconfiguartion
